citation: Proclamation under the Police Powers (Surveillance Devices) Act 2006 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Police Powers (Surveillance Devices) Act 2006

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Police Powers (Surveillance Devices) Act 2006 fix 1 January 2009 as the day on which that Act commences.

22 December 2008

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

MICHELLE O'BYRNE

Minister for Environment, Parks, Heritage and the Arts acting for and on behalf of the Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 31 December 2008

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
